nodes.text: Battle of the Abron system  (Great Sith War)

A battle was a battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Mandalorian Crusaders, in 3996 BBY. At the Abron system, the two sides fought with the Mandalorians emerging as the victors.
The battle was referenced in The Essential Atlas. It only illustrates the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose.
